text: The 1984 AFC Asian Cup was the 8th edition of the men's AFC Asian Cup, a quadrennial international football tournament organised by the Asian Football Confederation (AFC). The finals were hosted by Singapore between 1 December and 16 December 1984. The field of ten teams was split into two groups of five. Saudi Arabia won their first title, beating China in the final 2â€“0. Category:1984 in association football Category:1984 events Category:AFC Asian Cup tournaments
title: 1984 AFC Asian Cup
